Faq.question1: In which directions do you organize transportation?
Faq.answer1: We provide transportation services in various directions. Most of the transportation we do is international. However, if you are interested in transportation within Ukraine, you can confidently call us or submit a request for a quote, and our managers will assist you.
Faq.question2: What is the delivery time for the cargo?
Faq.answer2: The duration of delivery depends on the route, distance, and type of cargo. To get a specific delivery time, you can simply contact our staff, and they will accurately calculate the delivery time.
Faq.question3: Do you have your own fleet of vehicles?
Faq.answer3: Yes, we carry out the delivery of your cargo using both our own and leased vehicles.
Faq.answer4: We provide a wide range of services, from seamless transportation of your cargo to logistics auditing. For safety purposes, we can also insure the cargo. If necessary, you can contact us for customs clearance.
Faq.question5: What is the tariff for cargo transportation?
Faq.answer5: This indicator depends on many factors, such as the route, type of cargo, type of transportation required for delivery, organization of additional services, and more. For a detailed calculation of the tariff for transporting your cargo, please submit a request for a quote or call us, and our managers will quickly and accurately calculate the cost.

About.description: UDline is an international transport and logistics company. We offer organization of cargo transportation by road in Ukraine and abroad, regardless of the type and complexity of the cargo. Our main transportation routes include Ukraine, Poland, France, Germany, Netherlands, Czech Republic, Switzerland, Belgium, Spain, Portugal, Italy, Lithuania, Latvia, Kazakhstan, and Turkey.
